about_the_game:
You have conquered the dungeon and seized your treasures. As the night is falling, your party sets the campfire and start cooking your captured denizens. Meats sizzling, vegetables boiling... you start to feel hungry and you're getting ready to feast!

But you are not the only ones hungry in the woods...

Now you must protect your campfire dinner from the incoming goblins, lizards and other hungry denizens! Can you survive the waves and enjoy your well-deserved dinner?



Summon your team of meal-protectors! You can have to 7 units that consists of
🍖 laser-benders,
🍖 lightning shooters,
🍖 arrow barragers,
🍖 or even “flea-shepherds” that commands army of self-destructing critters!




Prepare your units and have them work well with each other. Each of the Units carries specific traits that works together in a weird but wicked way.
🍖 Shoots double, triple lasers? Check.
🍖 Want to curse the goblins with multiple ailments? Check!
🍖 Or maybe you just want to fool around and rain bullets at them? Also check!



You will need to protect the dinner until they go away. Survive, and you can happily feast on whatever you’re cooking. Fail, and weep in your hungry, dreadful cold night in the forest. Can you become the true Dinner Defenders and get the meal that you totally deserve?



Play Dinner Defenders by Reima Project!

name: Dinner Defenders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ or higher, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280 with 3 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Protect your campfire cooking in Dinner Defenders, a roguelike tower defense game. Summon units and utilize combination of their skills and synergies to fend off the hungry goblins and orcs. Survive, and finally have your well-deserved meal in the middle of forest!
